Text:
This source is great: the files have closing credits ! I miss them in the source you usually use. 
Thanks from France for your hard work.
thanks msfenmore, I agree i like having the credits and all. thanks for doing it everyday. :)

I know it´s cool with the credits, but the other one is way easier for me...and I´ll have some changes with my job soon, so I´ll have less time then, so I´ll go back to the old source once it´s up again...!!

I my self my humble opinion i don't care about the end credits but the best way for MsFenmore to upload the show and to not have time problems and stuff.!And i hope that with your job to still find time to upload it.Do your thing girl and your work its very much apreciated.Cheers.;-)
Of course ! Do the easiest for you. We really appreciate everything you do.
My wife thanks you and I do too...We really appreciate the work you do to put these out there everyday.
Yes, definitely don't stress yourself out. Even if you don't get a chance to put it up on this site right away. Really appreciate what you have been doing for all of us!  THANKS :)
